hero_subtitle: Pulse Dancers is all about serious quality and South Africa's BEST male entertainment. These men are handpicked and only available here.
about_paragraphs: Host a packed Ladies Night with our famous choreographed Strip Show, MC, topless waiters and trained podium dancers to entertain the crowds.
Based in Johannesburg, South Africa; with regular visits to Durban, Cape Town, Eastern Cape, Namibia, North West and more.
services: MC to play games for your Bachelorette Party
